snippet: The Pay With Square service makes transactions easier than ever. If a retailer has your name and photo in its system, you only have to announce yourself to pay your bill.
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column notes the Pay With Square smartphone app makes shopping transactions easier than ever; points out if a retailer has your name and photo in its system, you only have to announce yourself to pay your bill; also highlights app imitators.
lead_paragraph: The Pay With Square service makes transactions easier than ever. If a retailer has your name and photo in its system, you only have to announce yourself to pay your bill.

headline.seo: As Pay-by-Phone Advances, Square Takes Another Leap — State of the Art
headline.main: Pay by Voice? So Long, Wallet
headline.print_headline: Pay by Voice? So Long, Wallet
